ProjectTitle: The role of the built environment in (un)supportive working conditions: Learning from experiences on the autism spectrum
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/06/2024
Very clear and comprehensive DMP! A suggestion regarding data sharing:
Data sharing in an RDM context means publishing your data on a trusted data repository like for example the KU Leuven Research Data Repository (https://rdr.kuleuven.be/). The institutional repository helps KU Leuven researchers to publish, share, cite and preserve their data in a findable, accessible, interoperable and reusable way with support from KU Leuven staff. The data are safely preserved on KU Leuven servers, receive a DOI and are automatically linked with Lirias. It is also possible to put pseudonymized data in restricted access. If someone requests access to the data, you can evaluate the request and then a data sharing agreement will be drawn up together with the KU Leuven RDR team and legal team in order to protect the data. More information: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/custom-kuleuven
label: good with suggestions
